text: Until Next Spring () is a 1960 Soviet drama movie directed by Viktor Sokolov.От Гоголя до Шекспира. 5 лучших фильмов режиссера Григория КозинцеваДО БУДУЩЕЙ ВЕСНЫ It stars Lyudmila Marchenko, Innokentiy Smoktunovskiy, and Galina Vasilyeva. == Actors == * Lyudmila Marchenko as Vera * Innokentiy Smoktunovskiy as Aleksey * Galina Vasilyeva as Natasha (as G. Wassilewa) * Vladimir Andreyev as Vasiliy (as Wadim Andrejew) * Mariya Prizvan-Sokolova as Nastya * Valentin Arkhipenko as father of Vera == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1960 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Until Next Spring
